entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
